arez.annotations

Enum InjectMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<InjectMode>
      • arez.annotations.InjectMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<InjectMode>

    public enum InjectMode
extends Enum<InjectMode>
    Enum that controls how the component interacts with the injection framework if at all. Arez currently assumes that Dagger2 is used as the injection framework. The artifacts that are generated when injections is enable vary based on the configuration of the component and whether the component has a method annotated with PostConstruct. This is an extremely rough part of the toolkit which requires excessive work by the user. It is likely that in the future all of this will be automated away.
    • A component configured with CONSUME and either has no PostConstruct annotated method and no Observe annotated methods and no Memoize with keep alive set to true or only uses constructor injection will have the javax.inject.Inject annotation added to the constructor.
    • A component configured with PROVIDE and either has no PostConstruct annotated method and no Observe annotated methods and no Memoize with keep alive set to true or only uses constructor injection will have the javax.inject.Inject annotation added to the constructor and a Dagger2 module created named [MyComponent]DaggerModule which must be added to the desired component.
    • A component configured with CONSUME and a PostConstruct annotated method and has non-constructor based injection will have an interface named [MyComponent]DaggerComponentExtension created that the desired component must extend. The extension has a method named bind[MyComponent]() that must be invoked before any instances of the arez component can be created.
    • A component configured with PROVIDE and a PostConstruct annotated method and has non-constructor based injection will have an interface named [MyComponent]DaggerComponentExtension created that the desired component must extend. The extension has a method named bind[MyComponent]() that must be invoked before any instances of the arez component can be created. The extension also contains a dagger module named [MyComponent]DaggerComponentExtension.DaggerModule that MUST be added to the component manually.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      AUTODETECT
      Allow the annotation processor to determine whether injection should be enabled.
      CONSUME
      The component must be created and injected by the injection framework.
      NONE
      InjectMode is disabled.
      PROVIDE
      This enum has the same characteristics as CONSUME and may also be injected into other components managed by the injection framework.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NONE

        public static final InjectMode NONE
        InjectMode is disabled. The component can not be created by the injection framework. It is an error if the injections is disabled and the component has javax.inject.Inject annotations present.

      • CONSUME

        public static final InjectMode CONSUME
        The component must be created and injected by the injection framework. The component MUST have a single constructor otherwise the injection framework will not know how to create the component.

      • PROVIDE

        public static final InjectMode PROVIDE
        This enum has the same characteristics as CONSUME and may also be injected into other components managed by the injection framework.

      • AUTODETECT

        public static final InjectMode AUTODETECT
        Allow the annotation processor to determine whether injection should be enabled. If any fields or methods in the component or any parent type has an javax.inject.Inject annotation OR the class has an annotation that is itself annotated with the javax.inject.Scope annotation then the component will be assumed to be PROVIDE otherwise the value NONE is assumed.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static InjectMode[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (InjectMode c : InjectMode.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

        public static InjectMode valueOf(String name)

        Parameters:
